title: Three Hamas leaders killed months ago, IDF says

title: UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius
content: In a historic move, the UK gives up sovereignty of a strategic group of islands in the Indian Ocean.

title: Trump 'resorted to crimes' to overturn 2020 election, prosecutors say

title: Hospital fire in Taiwan kills nine people

title: Treasure hunter finally finds Golden Owl after decades
content: An owl statuette which was buried 31 years ago as part of a treasure hunt has reportedly been found in France.

title: Singapore ex-minister gets prison in rare case

title: Dominican Republic 'to deport up to 10,000 migrants a week'
